title: 【请大家帮忙联署】要求制裁香港警務處處長鄧炳強
contents:

Demand for sanction on the Commissioner of Police of the Hong Kong Police Force Chris Tang Ping

Created by A.C. on April 06, 2020

Tang Ping-keung, (鄧炳強 in Chinese) has been accused of the suppression of protests in Hong Kong
Some evidence: On November 11, the traffic police Kwan Kar Wing drew his gun at an unarmed protestor and aim his gun at the protestor in a point blank range. Another traffic police intentionally drove motorcycle into the protestors on the same day. These had clearly violated the police guideline. However, none of these police are being prosecuted.
Based on the above evidence, Tang Ping-keung is clearly favoring the police who should be prosecuted, and this seriously erodes the rule of law in Hong Kong. We demand the U.S. Government to sanction on Tang Ping-keung based on the Hong Kong Human Rights and Democracy Act, revokes citizenship and freeze assets of Tang Ping-keung anywhere outside China.
